19 import rospy
20 
21 from niryo_robot_rpi.common.rpi_ros_utils import activate_learning_mode, auto_calibration
22 
23 from .end_effector_io import DigitalInput, DigitalOutput
24 
25 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.api import ToolsRosWrapper, ToolID
26 from niryo_robot_utils import NiryoRosWrapperException
27 
28 # Messages
29 from std_msgs.msg import Int32, Bool
30 from end_effector_interface.msg import EEButtonStatus
31 from niryo_robot_status.msg import RobotStatus
32 from end_effector_interface.msg import EEIOState
33 
34 
35 class NiryoEndEffectorPanel:
36 
37  def __init__(self, on_change_callback):
38 
39  rospy.logdebug("Niryo end effector panel - Entering in Init")
40 
41  # - Init
42  self.__robot_status = RobotStatus()
43  self.__on_change_callback = on_change_callback
44 
45  self.__learning_mode_button_state = EEButtonStatus.NO_ACTION
46  self.__custom_button_state = EEButtonStatus.NO_ACTION
47  self.__save_pos_button_state = False
48 
49  self.__tool = ToolsRosWrapper()
50  self.__tool_state = False
51 
52  self.digital_input = DigitalInput(rospy.get_param("~end_effector_ios/digital_input"))
53  self.digital_output = DigitalOutput(rospy.get_param("~end_effector_ios/digital_output"))
54 
55  # - Publishers
56  self.save_point_publisher = rospy.Publisher(
57  "/niryo_robot/blockly/save_current_point", Int32, queue_size=10)
58 
59  self.__button_state_publisher = rospy.Publisher(
60  "/niryo_robot/rpi/is_button_pressed", Bool, latch=True, queue_size=1)
61 
62  # - Subscribers
63  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_status/robot_status', RobotStatus, self._callback_robot_status)
64 
65  self.__learning_mode_button_topic = rospy.Subscriber(
66  '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/end_effector_interface/free_drive_button_status',
67  EEButtonStatus, self.__callback_learning_mode_button)
68 
69  self.__save_pos_button_topic = rospy.Subscriber(
70  '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/end_effector_interface/save_pos_button_status',
71  EEButtonStatus, self.__callback_save_pos_button_status)
72 
73  self.__custom_button_topic = rospy.Subscriber(
74  '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/end_effector_interface/custom_button_status',
75  EEButtonStatus, self.__callback_custom_pos_button_status)
76 
77  self.__ee_io_state_topic = rospy.Subscriber(
78  '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/end_effector_interface/io_state',
79  EEIOState, self.__callback_ee_io_state)
80 
81  rospy.loginfo("Niryo end effector panel started")
82 
83  rospy.on_shutdown(self.on_shutdown)
84 
85  def __del__(self):
86  pass
87 
88  def on_shutdown(self):
89  self.__learning_mode_button_topic.unregister()
90  self.__save_pos_button_topic.unregister()
91 
92  def _callback_robot_status(self, msg):
93  self.__robot_status = msg.robot_status
94 
95  def __callback_learning_mode_button(self, msg):
96  if self.__learning_mode_button_state != msg:
97  if msg.action == EEButtonStatus.HANDLE_HELD_ACTION:
98  activate_learning_mode(True)
99  self.__learning_mode_button_state = msg.action
100  elif (msg.action == EEButtonStatus.NO_ACTION and
101  self.__learning_mode_button_state == EEButtonStatus.HANDLE_HELD_ACTION):
102  activate_learning_mode(False)
103  self.__learning_mode_button_state = msg.action
104 
105  def __callback_save_pos_button_status(self, msg):
106  if msg.action in [EEButtonStatus.NO_ACTION, EEButtonStatus.LONG_PUSH_ACTION,
107  EEButtonStatus.HANDLE_HELD_ACTION]:
108  pressed = False
109  elif msg.action in [EEButtonStatus.SINGLE_PUSH_ACTION]:
110  pressed = True
111  else:
112  return
113  if pressed != self.__save_pos_button_state:
114  self.__save_pos_button_state = pressed
115  self.__button_state_publisher.publish(pressed)
116  if pressed:
117  self.blockly_save_current_point()
118 
119  def __callback_custom_pos_button_status(self, msg):
120  old_button_state = self.__custom_button_state
121  self.__custom_button_state = msg.action
122 
123  custom_button_pressed = None
124 
125  if old_button_state == EEButtonStatus.HANDLE_HELD_ACTION \
126  and self.__custom_button_state == EEButtonStatus.NO_ACTION:
127  custom_button_pressed = False
128  elif old_button_state == EEButtonStatus.NO_ACTION \
129  and self.__custom_button_state == EEButtonStatus.HANDLE_HELD_ACTION:
130  custom_button_pressed = True
131 
132  if custom_button_pressed is not None:
133  self.__button_state_publisher.publish(custom_button_pressed)
134 
135  if self.__robot_status in [RobotStatus.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS, RobotStatus.RUNNING_DEBUG,
136  RobotStatus.PAUSE, RobotStatus.REBOOT_MOTOR]:
137  return
138 
139  try:
140  if old_button_state != EEButtonStatus.NO_ACTION == self.__custom_button_state:
141  if self.__robot_status == RobotStatus.CALIBRATION_NEEDED:
142  auto_calibration()
143  elif self.__tool.get_current_tool_id() != ToolID.NONE:
144  if self.__tool_state:
145  self.__tool.release_with_tool()
146  else:
147  self.__tool.grasp_with_tool()
148  self.__tool_state = not self.__tool_state
149  else:
150  self.__tool.update_tool()
151  if self.__tool.get_current_tool_id():
152  rospy.sleep(0.1)
153  self.__tool.release_with_tool()
154  self.__tool_state = False
155  except NiryoRosWrapperException:
156  pass
157 
158  def __callback_ee_io_state(self, msg):
159  if self.digital_input.value != msg.digital_input or self.digital_output.value != msg.digital_output:
160  self.digital_input.value = msg.digital_input
161  self.digital_output.force_value(msg.digital_output)
162 
163  self.__on_change_callback()
164 
165  def blockly_save_current_point(self):
166  msg = Int32()
167  msg.data = 1
168  self.save_point_publisher.publish(msg)
